author: thechachman
title: Uber: Flat Fare 30-Day Ride Package from: uberX $4 or uberPool $2 (20 or 40 Ride Options; Select Cities)
text: Pick a package that fits your needs 20 Flat-Fare Rides for $10 Activation Fee 40 Flat -Fare Rides for a $20 Activation Fee Flat fares are instantly available to use after your purchase and apply when you request uberPOOL or uberX Editor's Notes & Price Research Discombobulated This option gives the frequent rides a more affordable everyday ride option at a flat fare pricing. There is a limit of one package per rider per city. The pass will be valid for 30 days. Please refer to the forum thread for all internal discussion - Discombobulated
